trans-unit.source: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform integer validation on a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 以声明方式指示要执行的配置属性整数验证的.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: You use the IntegerValidatorAttribute attribute to decorate a configuration property, which will instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator> object and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters.
trans-unit.target: 你使用 IntegerValidatorAttribute 特性修饰配置属性，将指示要验证属性使用的.NET Framework<xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator>对象并将装饰参数的值传递给它。</xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator>

trans-unit.source: You can apply IntegerValidatorAttribute attributes to property types only.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 IntegerValidatorAttribute 特性应用到仅适用于属性类型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: You use this constructor in the attributed model to assure that the value assigned to the related property is an integer.
trans-unit.target: 特性化模型中使用此构造函数，以确保分配给相关属性的值是一个整数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include or exclude the integers in the range defined by the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue*> and <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*> property values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要包含或排除定义的范围内的整数<> *1> 和<> *1> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The range is inclusive of the <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 范围是包括<xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the ExcludeRange property value is `true`, the allowed values are outside the range.
trans-unit.target: 当 ExcludeRange 属性值是`true`，允许的值为超出范围。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value must be excluded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果必须排除值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value allowed for the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的属性允许的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The MaxValue property value is included in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: MaxValue 属性值包含在允许的范围。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the allowed maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指示允许的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>.
trans-unit.target: 所选的值小于<xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>.</xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum value allowed for the property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置属性允许的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The MinValue property value is included in the allowed range.
trans-unit.target: MinValue 属性值包含在允许的范围。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the allowed minimum value.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，指示允许的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is greater than <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>.
trans-unit.target: 所选的值大于<xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>.</xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.IntegerValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref href="System.Configuration.IntegerValidator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: You use the ValidatorInstance property to perform string validation by calling its <xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ValidatorInstance 属性用于通过调用执行字符串验证其<xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.IntegerValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> validator instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"> </xref>验证程序实例。
